Class Light

  • java.lang.Object
    • tk.luminos.luminoscore.graphics.gameobjects.Light

  • public class Light
extends java.lang.Object
    The light is a wrapper for position, color, and attenuation
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Nick Clark
